attributes.action: Investigate the use of pandemic money given to the Scottish government
attributes.background:
The people of Scotland for 14 year have not had transparency on what the Scottish government is spending our money on.

It has been reported that emergency funds given to the Scottish Government during the pandemic has not been used for its intended purpose and this should be investigated

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
